channel.title: HELP! how do0 i make commands?
channel.description: i need help on how to add commands like ::pimp or somthing i need help

item.title: HELP! how do0 i make commands?
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

Ill help you now, but next time use the search button.
A command for example looks like this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pimp")) { addItem(1050, 1); //Santa hat sendMessage("Have fun with your santa hat"); } The addItem Variable's syntax is: addItem(itemnumber, amount); You can put in as many as you want. the sendMessage variable's syntax is: sendMessage("Message here"); If you make a command like above, it will give you a santa hat and sends a message to the player saying: Have fun with your santa hat.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! how do0 i make commands?
